revision.comment: combine adjacent calls to {{inflection of|la|xērophilus}} (4); combine {{inflection of|la|xērophilus}} tag sets nom|n|p and acc|n|p into nom//acc|n|p; combine {{inflection of|la|xērophilus}} tag sets nom|f|s and voc|f|s into nom//voc|f|s; combine {{inflection of|la|xērophilus}} tag sets nom//acc|n|p and voc|n|p into nom//acc//voc|n|p
